posts.title: The Long Way Down: The crash of Air France flight 447

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: The story of the infamous disappearance of an Airbus A330 over the Atlantic, and the fundamentally human mistakes which led to the tragedy.

posts.title: The Darkest Day of Basketball: The crash of Air Indiana flight 216

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: As a DC-3 departs Evansville, Indiana, a chain of errors committed on the ground leads to the loss of a beloved basketball team.

posts.title: Rain of Fire Falling: The crash of American Airlines flight 191

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: Corner-cutting at American Airlines leads to a spectacular crash at Chicago O’Hare, killing 273 in America’s worst air disaster.

posts.title: The Cost of Inaction: The crash of Air India Express flight 1344

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: Failure to learn the lessons of past tragedies causes a Boeing 737 to run off an Indian runway for the second time in ten years.

posts.title: Down in Chuuk Lagoon: The crash of Air Niugini flight 73

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: Reckless decision-making on approach causes a Boeing 737 to crash into the sea short of the runway in Micronesia.

posts.title: An Orchestrated Litany of Lies: The crash of Air New Zealand flight 901

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: The devastating crash of a sightseeing flight in Antarctica leads to one of the greatest national crises in the history of New Zealand.

posts.title: Death of a Dream: The crash of Air France flight 4590

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: The fiery crash of a Concorde outside Paris shocks the world and calls into question the future of supersonic passenger travel.

posts.title: Lessons of Another Age: The crashes of United Airlines flights 608 and 624

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: Two crashes from the propeller era illustrate the origins of safety features which air travelers today take for granted.

posts.title: A Legal and Moral Question: The crash of Turkish Airlines flight 981 and the DC-10 cargo door saga

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: The story of how McDonnell Douglas’s corporate culture led to the deaths of 346 people in one of the deadliest plane crashes of all time.

posts.title: Confusion on the Runway: The crash of USAir flight 5050

extendedPreviewContent.subtitle: A series of errors of judgment sends a Boeing 737 off the runway at LaGuardia, with fatal results.
